organization.description: An archive of the datasets hosted on https://leedsdatamill.org
organization.title: leeds-datamill-archive
organization.name: leeds-datamill-archive

name: council-budgetsf0b39
notes: This dataset provides a detailed analysis of the approved budget for Leeds City Council, as agreed by Full Council each year.  The data provides an analysis by directorate, summary budget heading and budget heading and a description of the type of expenditure or income that the budget is for.
title: Council Budgets
